circuit_id.name: circuit_id
circuit_id.description: The id of the circuit to fetch details for.
circuit_id.validation_error_text: Parameter circuit_id only accepts integer numbers.

link.name: link
link.description: Name of the link to view data for, if specified node/interface should not be specified.
link.validation_error_text: Parameter link only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

interface.name: interface
interface.description: The name of the interface on the node to look at for the usage statistics. Must be specified when the node parameter is defined.
interface.validation_error_text: Parameter interface only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

node.name: node
node.description: the node to look at for the circuit usage data.
node.validation_error_text: Parameter node only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

start.name: start
start.validation_error_text: Parameter start only accepts positive integers and 0.

end.name: end
end.validation_error_text: Parameter end only accepts positive integers and 0.

name: get_circuit_data
description: returns JSON formatted usage statistics for a circuit from start time to end time, and for a specific node or interface in the circuit.
